abstract: Morgan Freeman is narrating several ads for Hillary Clinton’s campaign ahead of the Feb. 27 Democratic primary in South Carolina, where she and Senator Bernie Sanders are courting black voters.

headline.print_headline: ‘Voice of God’ Does Clinton Campaign Ad
headline.main: Morgan Freeman, Hollywood’s ‘Voice of God,’ Narrates Ad for Hillary Clinton

snippet: Morgan Freeman is narrating several ads for Hillary Clinton’s campaign ahead of the Feb. 27 Democratic primary in South Carolina, where she and Senator Bernie Sanders are courting black voters.
